snippet.title: "Kemono Teatime" 2ndPV"KAWAII moratorium"
snippet.description:
≪Animal ears × cafe × ASMR≫ "Kemono Teatime" (Steam)

All good things come to an end.

Co-produced by voice actress: Kotori Koiwai;
The BEST "cute & adorable" experiment "Kemono Teatime" 
2025 Spring ON SALE ฅ^•ﻌ•^ฅ

🐾Demo ver. available in the Steam store!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3345060/

-------------------------
☕️Product
-------------------------
Title：Kemono Teatime
Release date：2025 Spring
Genre：Kemomimi Cafe ASMR adventure
Number of Players：One
Platform：Steam🄬
Languages：Japanese/English/Simplified Chinese/Traditional Chinese
Publisher：Studio Lalala

-------------------------
☕️Staff
-------------------------
Producers：Fuyuki Hayashi / Kotori Koiwai
Planning / Screenwriting：Fuyuki Hayashi
Directors：Fuyuki Hayashi / Takahiro Akuta
Programming：ART Co.,Ltd.
Key visual / Character design：NOCO
Pixel art：Curemoto / Oyuzaki / Sky Scraper Project / Mokuya / Akayu
Logo：Hiroto Sugahara
Music：Snail’s House
ASMR：Kotoneiro
Pixel animation：APO+
Animation：Mamesuzu
Trailer：Gai Kidokoro
Translation：Dragonbaby LLC

🐾Wishlist Kemono Teatime in Steam！
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2698470/

🐾Official Social Media
Discord │ https://discord.gg/VHCGDYS5Wh
X │ https://x.com/Studio_Lalala_E/

🐾Official Site
https://www.studiolalala.net/
